slides.title: Welcome to ACCA SBL
slides.content:
# Strategic Business Leader (SBL)

SBL integrates **strategic and professional skills** for business leadership.

## What You Will Learn

- **Strategy** - Analysis and choice
- **Governance** - Ethical leadership
- **Risk** - Management frameworks
- **Leadership** - Professional skills

## Syllabus Areas

| Area | Weight |
|------|--------|
| Leadership | 15% |
| Governance | 15% |
| Strategy | 30% |
| Risk | 10% |
| Finance | 10% |
| Innovation/Digital | 10% |
| Professional skills | 10% |

slides.title: Strategic Position
slides.content:
# Strategic Analysis

slides.title: Corporate Governance
slides.content:
# Governance Framework

## UK Corporate Governance Code

| Principle | Focus |
|-----------|-------|
| Leadership | Effective board |
| Effectiveness | Skills and experience |
| Accountability | Risk and controls |
| Remuneration | Fair and performance-linked |
| Relations | Shareholder engagement |

## Board Structure

| Role | Responsibility |
|------|---------------|
| Chairman | Leads board |
| CEO | Runs business |
| NEDs | Independent oversight |
| Company Secretary | Governance support |

## Apply or Explain

Companies must apply code or explain why not.

slides.title: Risk Management
slides.content:
# Enterprise Risk Management

## Risk Categories

| Category | Examples |
|----------|----------|
| Strategic | Competition, market |
| Operational | Systems, processes |
| Financial | Currency, interest |
| Compliance | Legal, regulatory |

## Risk Process

```
Identify -> Assess -> Treat -> Monitor
```

## Risk Response

| Response | Action |
|----------|--------|
| Accept | Live with risk |
| Transfer | Insure, outsource |
| Reduce | Controls |
| Avoid | Exit activity |

## Risk Appetite

Level of risk organization willing to take.

slides.title: Change Management
slides.content:
# Managing Change

## Lewin's Model

```
Unfreeze -> Change -> Refreeze
```

## Kotter's 8 Steps

1. Create urgency
2. Form coalition
3. Create vision
4. Communicate vision
5. Remove obstacles
6. Short-term wins
7. Build on change
8. Anchor in culture

## Resistance to Change

| Cause | Response |
|-------|----------|
| Fear | Communication |
| Habit | Training |
| Self-interest | Negotiation |
| Misunderstanding | Education |
